body_html:
@w4nderlust This solution works well! But I do not understand your code. My code is below:

class_weights = tf.multiply(one_hot_labels, class_weights)
loss_crossentropy = tf.losses.softmax_cross_entropy(class_weights,tf.reshape(logits, (-1,classnum)))
where the shape of class_weights is [1, num_classes]

@w4nderlust This solution works well! But I do not understand your code. My code is below:

`class_weights = tf.multiply(one_hot_labels, class_weights)`
`loss_crossentropy = tf.losses.softmax_cross_entropy(class_weights,tf.reshape(logits, (-1,classnum)))`
where the shape of class_weights is [1, num_classes]
